name: Manya
wishText:
I find myself so thankful for having someone like you in my life.
You're the smoke to my high.
Thank you for being you.
I wish you all the happiness and love (lol) in the years to come!
May the power of anime always be with you!
textInChatBox: Heppy birthdaaaayyyyyy Manyaaaa!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
